attributes.action: Urge the UK government to supply “PPE” to bus drivers and secure their safety!
attributes.additional_details: Bus drivers are in the front line transporting essential workers and all members of the public to and from places they need to be. They are facing a high risk of contracting an infection to COVID-19 and are currently in need of urgent and more PPE as well as safer stringent measures to guarantee their safety while on duty
attributes.background: Provide masks, gloves, hand sanitising gel, face shields or eye wear protection, enhanced in-cab cleaning, cleansing wipes, disinfect all surfaces throughout bus saloons.
